settings.mcpDisableAllTip: Disable all MCP servers at once

Current item count of the 4-layer memory system

Enable RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)

settings.memoryAutoSaveTip:
After each response, Memory Risk Gate evaluates quality

Quality evaluation by ministral-3:8b

settings.refreshStatsTip: Fetch the latest item counts and statistics

settings.residentGpuTargetTip: Select GPU for resident model execution

settings.optToolBrowserUseDesc: JS-rendered page URL fetching (localAI). Without it, only static pages can be fetched.
settings.optToolSentenceTransDesc: Local embedding generation (RAG). Without it, Ollama Embedding is used.

chatHistory.title: Chat History
chatHistory.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?

mainWindow.settingsSaved: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings saved. (Some settings take effect after restart)
mainWindow.mixAITip:
mixAI - Integrated Execution Architecture

High-precision orchestration with Claude Code + local LLM team


„ÉªPhase 1: Claude planning (response + LLM instructions)
„ÉªPhase 2: Local LLM sequential execution
„ÉªPhase 3: Claude comparison & integration

Ctrl+Enter to send message
mainWindow.cloudAITip:
cloudAI - Cloud AI Chat & Settings

Direct conversation with Claude CLI, integrated MCP management.

Sub-tabs:
„ÉªChat: AI conversation
„ÉªSettings: CLI/Ollama settings, MCP management

Ctrl+Enter to send message
mainWindow.localAITip:
localAI - Local LLM Chat

Direct conversation with local models via Ollama.

Sub-tabs:
„ÉªChat: Local LLM conversation
„ÉªSettings: Ollama management, custom server settings

Ctrl+Enter to send message
mainWindow.infoTip:
Information Collection - Autonomous RAG Pipeline

Store documents and automatically build RAG
with Claude + local LLMs.

3 Steps:
„ÉªStep 1: Claude plan creation
„ÉªStep 2: Local LLM autonomous execution
„ÉªStep 3: Claude quality verification
mainWindow.ragTip:
RAG - AI Knowledge Base

RAG context building, Knowledge Graph management.
Manage RAG through AI chat.
mainWindow.historyTip:
History - Unified Chat History

Search, view, and quote chat history from all tabs via JSONL.

Features:
„ÉªTab filter (cloudAI / mixAI / localAI / All)
„ÉªFull-text search & date grouping
„ÉªCopy messages & quote to other tabs
mainWindow.settingsTip:
General Settings - App-wide Configuration

Display settings, automation options, etc.

Key Features:
„ÉªTheme & font settings
„ÉªAuto-save settings
„ÉªKnowledge/Encyclopedia

Claude CLI is not available.

localAI.continueSub: Send a message to continue a stopped process
localAI.addModelDesc: Register a model to use. Select a connection method, then enter the model call name using the examples below.
localAI.addModelNameTooltip: Display name shown in the app (optional). Defaults to model ID if blank
localAI.providerTooltip:
Select connection method
¬∑ API: Requires API key (pay-per-use)
¬∑ CLI: Requires official CLI tool
localAI.modelIdTooltip:
The official model call name for the provider
See examples below
localAI.noModelsConfigured: No models registered. Go to Settings ‚Üí Cloud Model Management ‚Üí Add to register a model.
localAI.browserUseTip:
When enabled, the local LLM can fetch web pages with JS rendering via browser-use
(httpx fallback used automatically when browser_use is not installed)
localAI.browserUseHttpxMode:
When enabled, fetches URLs in prompts and injects content (current: static pages only, httpx-based)
Install browser-use for JavaScript-rendered pages:
pip install browser-use && python -m playwright install chromium
localAI.googleApiKeyLabel: Google API Key (Gemini) - Get: https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey (free, no credit card)
